snippet: The Army Corps of Engineers has settled a lawsuit that will force it to disclose for the first time the amount of pollutants its dams send into waterways.
abstract: Army Corps of Engineers settles lawsuit that will force it to disclose for first time amount of pollutants its dams send into waterways.
lead_paragraph: The Army Corps of Engineers has settled a lawsuit that will force it to disclose for the first time the amount of pollutants its dams send into waterways.

headline.main: Oregon: Corps of Engineers to Reveal Pollution Figures
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Corps of Engineers to Reveal Pollution Figures
